definition: time allocated for a project/completion date
work/worker/skill/profession/trade/craft/labor
variant of 期[qi1]/period/cycle
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: In constructing certain project, the time limit was short, so that the slip form techniques were adopted.
sentences.chinese: 在工期要求非常紧的情况下，该工程采用了滑模施工。

sentences.english: To general construction time use stage management .
sentences.chinese: 对总工期实行阶段管理。

sentences.english: Based on reasonable construction plan, shorten construction time 131 days.
sentences.chinese: 通过合理优化施工方案，缩短建井总工期131天。

sentences.english: The treatment of cracks requires a lot of labors and time, which could increase project cost and delay the construction period.
sentences.chinese: 而且裂缝的处理费工费时，增加工程成本并延长工期。

sentences.english: In construction period and after completion of the project, in concrete lining appeared a large amount of cracks.
sentences.chinese: 施工期及建成后，二次衬砌混凝土产生了大量的裂缝。

sentences.english: We try to be creative but also work within the schedule of the shot.
sentences.chinese: 我们试着既保持创新，又能在工期内完成镜头。

sentences.english: The part defects resulted from foundation treatment and constructing quality in construction period.
sentences.chinese: 局部出现的缺陷属于施工期基础处理和填筑质量问题。

sentences.english: This technology has such advantages as lowering construction time, decreasing costs and improving installation stationarity.
sentences.chinese: 该项技术可缩短工期，降低费用，提高安装的平稳性。

sentences.english: The construction period is short, the cost is save, the treatment effect is good for this construction technology.
sentences.chinese: 该施工工艺，工期短，造价低，处理效果好。

sentences.english: So analysis and study of structure reliability during construction period must be emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 因此必须重视施工期桥梁结构的可靠性分析与研究。

sentences.english: Gantt chart is an effective tool for planning and controlling project schedule.
sentences.chinese: 甘特图是工程项目进行工期计划和控制的有效工具。

sentences.english: Lower costs and shorter cycle times through effective use of resources.
sentences.chinese: 通过有效地使用资源，降低成本，缩短工期。

sentences.english: This problem shall be solved at once, or the project process would be delated .
sentences.chinese: 这个问题必须马上解决，否则会贻误工期。

sentences.english: Addition of high range water reducing agent can shorten construction period and enhance labour efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 掺加高效减水剂可缩短施工工期，提高劳动效率。

sentences.english: During construction large quantity of karst pipe water gushed into the tunnels.
sentences.chinese: 隧洞在施工期多处发生了大涌水。

sentences.english: Total project duration is expected to be completed at the end of 2014.
sentences.chinese: 项目总工期预计于2014年底全部竣工。

definition: construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
to finish work/to complete a project
unit in charge of construction/builder
to begin work (of a factory or engineering operation)/to start a construction job
engineering/an engineering project/project/undertaking/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
delivery time (time between ordering goods and receiving the delivery)/date of delivery
to start (a building project)
to complete a project
civil engineering/same as 土木工程[tu3 mu4 gong1 cheng2]
to work against the clock/to hurry with work to get it done in time
development cycle/development period/also written 開發週期|开发周期
development cycle/development period
to open to traffic (e.g. new bridge, rail line etc)/(of a locality) to have a transportation service/(Tw) to commute
to stop work/to shut down/to stop production
to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
to lay railway track
